courses.title: JavaScript Moderno & Pattern Avanzati
courses.description: Corso completo su ES2024+, Promises, async/await, pattern di programmazione funzionale e ottimizzazione delle performance in applicazioni JavaScript enterprise.

courses.title: Enterprise Architecture con .NET Core 8
courses.description: Architetture enterprise-ready con .NET 8, CQRS, Event Sourcing, microservizi e best practices per applicazioni scalabili in ambiente cloud.

courses.title: Angular 17 Master Class
courses.description: Deep dive in Angular 17: Signals, Server Components, performance optimization, state management avanzato e testing di applicazioni enterprise.

courses.title: .NET Core Microservices - The Complete Guide (.NET 6 MVC)
courses.description: Guida completa per costruire microservizi con .NET 6 e .NET Core MVC. Include architettura microservizi, Entity Framework Core, .NET Identity, Azure Service Bus e deployment con Docker.

courses.title: The Python Mega Course: Learn Python in 60 Days, Build 20 Apps
courses.description: Learn Python from zero to advanced by building real programs to gain the skills needed to land an entry-level job. Include machine learning, web development, automation, and GUI applications.

courses.title: From Zero to Hero: Docker for Developers
courses.description: Docker is one of the most essential tools that every developer needs to know. Learn everything from installation to mastering Docker usage, publishing images, and integrating it into your developer workflow.

courses.title: Blazor Deep Dive - From Beginner to Advanced in .NET 8
courses.description: A comprehensive journey with Blazor in .NET 8. Starting with fundamentals, this course supports beginners every step of the way and includes practical projects to solidify understanding and give practical experience in Blazor development.
